briefTitle: Micronutrient Sprinkles in a Daycare Center

armGroups.label: Micronutrient Sprinkles without zinc
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Micronutrient sprinkles without zinc

armGroups.label: Micronutrient sprinkles with zinc
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Micronutrient Sprinkles with zinc

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Healthy children attending day care

Exclusion Criteria:

* Chronic medical problems including sickle cell disease, congenital heart disease

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Children of Diarrhea Episodes
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of children with diarrhea divided by the number of children in the group

outcomeMeasures.title: Proportion of Children With Respiratory Infections
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of children with respiratory infections divided by the total number of children in the group
